channel.title: SoulGamerz.net
channel.description:
I am not sure if I have permission but hopefully Miss Silabsoft will give me some!
SoulGamerz.net Home to the New MMORPG Elddem and a Gaming/Graphics/Coding Community and just to hang out and play Elddem(Which is very very addicting to many people)
Features for Elddem include- 11 Beatutiful Maps and some in development 4 Classes to choose from(Minotar,Dark Knight, Knight,etc.) PVP-Player Vs. Player Real Time Updating(World items and things change around you as you play) Almost up 24/7 Over 25 Items and adding more and more 2 Different Shops to purchase items and things from Friendly Players- Apply for Mod or Mapper or Developer on SoulGamerz VERY Addicting You will not want to ever stop playing Chat System /away command /no command Armor, Weapons, Spells, Gold, Diamonds, and many things todo Guilds-Ask Kilk to make you one or join someone elses guild!(Great Fun)
And MANY MANY MANY More things todo!
Join www.soulgamerz.net and Download the Elddem Client there also!

I am not sure if I have permission but hopefully Miss Silabsoft will give me some!

SoulGamerz.net Home to the New MMORPG Elddem and a Gaming/Graphics/Coding Community and just to hang out and play Elddem(Which is very very addicting to many people)

Features for Elddem include-
11 Beatutiful Maps and some in development
4 Classes to choose from(Minotar,Dark Knight, Knight,etc.)
PVP-Player Vs. Player
Real Time Updating(World items and things change around you as you play)
Almost up 24/7
Over 25 Items and adding more and more
2 Different Shops to purchase items and things from

VERY Addicting You will not want to ever stop playing

Armor, Weapons, Spells, Gold, Diamonds, and many things todo
